metadata.title: CVE-2019-9028 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libmatio.a in matio (aka MAT File I/O Library) 1.5.13. There is a stack-based buffer over-read in the function InflateDimensions() in inflate.c when called from ReadNextCell in mat5.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-9028` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio11 - 1.5.13-3
matio-tools - 1.5.13-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmatio package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.13-3').
